content: The Pharmacy WG is adding new search parameters to MedicationRequest to support searches for requests for administration of medication at a specific time or during a period. At the moment I've added 2 search parameters: timing-period - MedicationRequest.dosageInstruction.timing.boundsPeriod and timing-event - MedicationRequest.dosageInstruction.timing.event. Will this cause any issues for implementers?
A single parameter would be better. @Grahame Grieve what's the syntax to combine both paths into one when defining the search parameter?

Here's the observation code one, which follows the same pattern:
Observation.code | Observation.component.code
